name: bibliographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a bibliography (= a list of the books and articles that have been used by someone when writing a particular book or article): The work is well-sourced and bibliographically thorough.
in a way that relates to libraries and the books and information they contain, and how to find them: These pamphlets remain largely unexplored by scholars, partly because they are so hard to categorize bibliographically. Related words
bibliography
bibliographical
More examplesFewer examplesBibliographically speaking, the collection includes an impressively vast range of works. Create a separate bibliographic record for the supplement if it is considered to be bibliographically important.A complete list of the books in his library is fascinating to read, at least for the bibliographically minded.
